Key Match Events: Tommy Pham's three-run homer in the fourth inning gave the Royals the lead and essentially ended Lively's night.
Seth Lugo struck out four batters and tallied nine swings and misses.
Post-Match Reflections: Lively now has a 5.80 ERA and a 1.49 WHIP over his last seven starts.
Brennan has silently been playing well over the last few weeks, with a.295/.311/.364 slash line over the last 15 games.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Will Brennan, who grew up not too far from Kansas City, always seems to play well against the Royals.
Seth Lugo executed his game plan to perfection, mostly offspeed and breaking, against the Guardians and left them guessing.
Others: The Cleveland Guardians had a chance to sweep their series against the Kansas City Royals, but Kansas City prevented that with a win in the finale on Wednesday evening, 4-1.
